# About {.unnumbered}

This is training in PsychoPy, for Level 6 BSc, scheduled for 9th February 2023.

Last compiled `r format(Sys.time(), '%A %d %B %Y at %X')`

```{r include=FALSE}
# screencasts go in obs
dir.create("docs/obs")
file.copy("obs","docs",recursive=TRUE)

# psyexps go in psy
unlink("psy/*/data/*")
dir.create("docs/psy")
file.copy("psy","docs",recursive=TRUE)

# stills go in img
dir.create("docs/img")
file.copy("img","docs",recursive=TRUE)
```
